snippet: Officer Melvin Santiago, 23, was killed while responding to a robbery call at a Walgreens store, and the gunman was shot and killed by other officers at the scene, the authorities said.
abstract: Jersey City Police Officer Melvin Santiago is shot dead by gunman Lawrence Campbell while responding to robbery call at a Walgreens store; authorities say Campbell was shot by other officers at the scene.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS
byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller reported from Jersey City, and Emma G. Fitzsimmons from New York.

lead_paragraph: Officer Melvin Santiago, 23, was killed while responding to a robbery call at a Walgreens store, and the gunman was shot and killed by other officers at the scene, the authorities said.

headline.main: Jersey City Officer Is Fatally Shot While Responding to Robbery Report
headline.print_headline: Jersey City Officer Is Shot to Death by Gunman; Police Kill Suspect
